name: GitHub widescreen compatibility hotfix
description: This userstyle is for utilizing the useful space of the widescreen monitor. Compatible with most aspect ratios, including 5:4, 16:9, 21:9 (ultrawide), and the inverted ratios (when the monitor is pivoted on it's side). It also works between the laptop resolution (768x1366) and desktop resolutions (1920x1080 and 2560x1440).
